General.Name: Andalan Sakti Primaindo PT
General.Description: PT Andalan Sakti Primaindo Tbk engages in the real estate business in Indonesia. It develops and rents residential properties; and sells houses, shop houses, and other similar property and related land. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Andalan Sakti Primaindo Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Andalan Sakti Inti.
General.Address: Sona Topas Tower, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12920
